title: Four teens shot after party in St. Louis
content:
ST. LOUIS • Four teenagers were recovering after being shot about 11:08 p.m. Saturday in a drive-by shooting in the 1400 block of North Market Street.
Authorities said that three of the four victims were in stable condition after being grazed by bullets. A fourth remained in critical but stable condition after being shot in the neck, police said.
The victims, all in their late teens, were shot when a party was letting out. A black SUV drove by and a shooter or shooters fired shots, hitting all four.
EDITOR'S NOTE: An earlier version of this story gave an incorrect time for the shooting. This version has been corrected.
